chapters.title: Chapter 43: Care for the Living
chapters.info: Damelle, p. 706 (637)—Ogier, daughter of Ala daughter of Soferra. In a book Loial once read, she wrote of the the first Waygate to be destroyed—it was near a stedding that had fallen to the Blight. It required 13 Aes Sedai working together using a sa'angreal. She also wrote of a later attempt to distroy a Waygate of similar circumstances using only nine sisters, an attempt that ended in disaster for the Aes Sedai.
